mapper.select: SELECT n.id,n.user_id userId,n.article_id articleId, n.comment_id commentId,u.avatar,u.website, u.nickname,a.article_title articleTitle,a.article_cover articleCover, c.comment_content commentContent,n.create_time createTime, c.user_id commentUserId,c.parent_id parentId FROM tb_notice n LEFT JOIN tb_article a ON n.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON n.comment_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE n.user_id = #{condition.userId} AND n.notice_type = #{condition.type} AND n.deleted_flag = false ORDER BY n.id DESC LIMIT #{condition.current}, #{condition.size}

SELECT n.id,n.user_id userId,n.article_id articleId, u.avatar,u.website,a.user_id articleUserId, u.nickname,a.article_title articleTitle,a.article_cover articleCover, c.comment_content commentContent,n.create_time createTime,n.notice_type_sub noticeTypeSub FROM tb_notice n LEFT JOIN tb_article a ON n.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON n.comment_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON n.create_user = u.id WHERE n.user_id = #{condition.userId} AND n.notice_type = #{condition.type} AND n.deleted_flag = false ORDER BY n.id DESC LIMIT #{condition.current}, #{condition.size}
